extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2022-30134 by verifying the installed version of Microsoft Exchange Server.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-30134?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Security Updates for Microsoft Exchange Server
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates provided by Microsoft to mitigate CVE-2022-30134 and other critical vulnerabilities.
